name: ML engineer
description:
Job description:

Intellectual Systems and Data Science Lab in Huawei Moscow office is looking for ML engineers of middle and senior level to work on the video codec improvement by means of AI. New codecs are developing mostly by weighting the complexity, and new technologies application could open a new era in the video compression. The goal of our team is to apply AI methods for conventional video codecs to improve them and to contribute to various standards in codec domain. AI-based video compression is science-intensive. It intersects with field of extraction interpretable semantics, scene understanding and conventional coding. So math background of candidate is a plus.

Requirements:

Degree in Math, Computer Science or related technical field.

Strong knowledge of DL frameworks (Tensorflow or Pytorch).

C/C++, Python knowledge is a plus.

Deep knowledge of DL concepts. (RNN, VAE, attention-based models)

At least 2 successful project in AI area.

Analytical mindset and good problem-solving skills.

Ability to work as part of a team.

Responsibilities:

Designing and implementing AI-based models to improve the latest codec standards.

Research in domains: semantic understanding, neural net compression, image/video enhancement, temporal video reconstruction.

Articles and patent writing.

Ensuring continuous professional self-development and guiding junior engineers.
